title: She Just Found Out Some Devastating News About The Father Of Her Child
description:
Last year she and the father of her children broke up after she found out he was cheating with his coworker. Months later, the two decided to try and make their relationship work. Now she's four months pregnant with their second child together.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
